Title: The Chalk Machine
Writer: Nic Sheff, Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by), Kirk A. Moore (executive story editor)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: Tyler and Cyrus embrace their outsider status. Alex fights to recover his lost memories. Ryan and Mrs. Baker look to Hannah's poems for clues.
